name: Iron Man
description: Genius, billionaire, playboy, and philanthropist. Tony Stark suits up as Iron Man to protect the world from threats.

name: Captain America
description: Steve Rogers, a super-soldier with enhanced strength, agility, and an unbreakable shield. Fights for justice and freedom.

name: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff, a skilled spy and assassin. Known for her agility, martial arts, and espionage expertise.

name: Thor
description: The God of Thunder, Thor wields Mjolnir and commands the power of lightning. Protector of Asgard and Earth.

name: Hulk
description: Bruce Banner transforms into the Hulk, a giant green powerhouse with immense strength and durability.

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, the king of Wakanda, possesses enhanced strength, speed, and agility. Wields the Black Panther suit.

name: Doctor Strange
description: Stephen Strange, a former neurosurgeon, now the Sorcerer Supreme. Masters the mystic arts to protect reality.

name: Spider-Man
description: Peter Parker, a friendly neighborhood superhero with enhanced agility, spider-sense, and web-slinging abilities.

name: Scarlet Witch
description: Wanda Maximoff, with reality-warping powers. A powerful and mystical force in the Marvel Universe.

name: Ant-Man
description: Scott Lang, a skilled thief with the ability to shrink and control ants. Uses the Ant-Man suit for heroics.
